title: About
text:
This site hosts the codebok for the SWINNO-database, which is a database of swedish innovations. For more information about the SWINNO project visit swedishinnovationdata.se.
This codebook is created using Quarto, and the source files behind the structure are openly hosted on GitHub where anyone can make suggestions for how to improve the codebook, hence living.
If you notice any mistakes or have suggestions for improvements, please report the error or suggest using the “Edit this page” or “Report an issue” links at the footer of every page.

title: Use_sectors
text:
use_sector
User sector of the innovation according to Svensk Näringslivsindelning SNI 2002, with a few custom codes.










 Coded values 


    

        
            general use for end-users (final consumers)
        

        
            Code:  -101 
        

        This is not an official SNI code

        

        
            general use for companies
        

        
            Code:  -100 
        

        This is not an official SNI code

        


No matching items

title: Exploiter
text:
exploiter
Linking innovatons to names of entities exploiting the innovation










Available Fields


    

        Innovation ID
        
         innovation_id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        

        Literal Name
        
         name 

        Literal name of an entity, as written in the article.

        



No matching items

title: Spinoff
text:
spinoff
The university or research institute that that the innovation spun off from










 Coded values 


    

        
            Research Institute Spinoff
        

        
            Code:  0 
        

        Research Institute Spinoff

        

        
            Universty Spinoff
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        Universty Spinoff

        


No matching items

title: Country
text:
country
In which country was the collaborating actor located during the collaboration. ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 codes with amendments.










 Coded values 


    

        
            Channel Islands
        

        
            Code:  ChannelIsland 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            German Democratic Republic
        

        
            Code:  DDR 
        

        German Democratic Republic (i.e. East Germany, before 3 October 1990)

        

        
            Federal Republic of Germany
        

        
            Code:  FRG 
        

        Federal Republic of Germany (i.e. West Germany before 3 October 1990)

        

        
            Sark
        

        
            Code:  Sark 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        


No matching items

title: Science_spin-off
text:
science_spin
Is the company a spinoff from a university or research institute










 Coded values 


    

        
            Yes
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        Either 'Yes' or the variable remains empty

        


No matching items

title: Innovation Status
text:
status
Status of the innovation










 Coded values 


    

        
            Available on the market (Process or product)
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Not yet available on the market
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        The development is finished, but the innovation is not yet for sale for some reason

        

        
            Process innovation - for internal use
        

        
            Code:  3 
        

        Only process innovations for internal use are marked as process innovations. When process innovations are sold on the market, then they get code '1 - Available on the market'

        

        
            Development not yet finished
        

        
            Code:  4 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Introduced before 1970
        

        
            Code:  5 
        

        This code is a remnant from SWINNO 1. It should not occur.

        

        
            Other, See 'Notes for data users'
        

        
            Code:  6 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Doubt case, See 'Notes for data editors'
        

        
            Code:  7 
        

        This code is in use for data-editors. It should not occur.

        


No matching items

title: Novelty_from_firm_perspective
text:
novelty_firm
Degree of novelty from the firm perspective










 Coded values 


    

        
            Totally new
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        Totally new

        

        
            Major improvement
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        Major improvement

        

        
            Incremental improvement
        

        
            Code:  3 
        

        Incremental improvement

        


No matching items

title: Novelty_from_market_perspective
text:
novelty_mkt
Degree of novelty from the perspective of the Swedish and the global market respectively










 Coded values 


    

        
            New to the Swedish market
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            New to the world market
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        


No matching items

title: Article
text:
article
LBIO sources










Available Fields


    

        Article ID
        
         article_id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the source article.

        

        Journal_or_magazine
        
         journal_magazine 

        The journal or magazine that contains the article This could be a standardized rather than a literal name

        

        Pages
        
         pages 

        On which pages does the article occur

        

        Issue
        
         issue 

        The journal s or annex issue that contains the article

        

        Article type
        
         type 

        A characterisation of the source content

        

        Volume
        
         vol 

        The volume of the source article

        

        Annex_or_supplement
        
         annex 

        The article s annex or supplement if any

        

        Article title
        
         title 

        The title of the source article.

        

        Notes
        
         notes 

        Additional notes about the article.

        

        Year of issue
        
         year 

        The year in which the article was published.

        



No matching items

title: Origins
text:
origin
Which factors contributed to the origin of the innovation










 Coded values 


    

        
            Environmental factors
        

        
            Code:  12 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Availability of license
        

        
            Code:  14 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Spin off
        

        
            Code:  19 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            New scientific discovery
        

        
            Code:  1a 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            New technologies or materials
        

        
            Code:  1b 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Other other factors
        

        
            Code:  20 
        

        Other other, which means 'other' but not 2d

        

        
            Official regulation, legislation and standards
        

        
            Code:  2a 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Public research program(s)
        

        
            Code:  2b 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Public procurement
        

        
            Code:  2c 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Other public driven origin
        

        
            Code:  2d 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Other public driven
        

        
            Code:  2e 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Competitive pressure driven
        

        
            Code:  3 
        

        Competitive pressure driven. For example, price competition, competition in performance, threat posed by rival innovations, shrinking market share or demand, rationalization of production  methods, enabling lower prices

        

        
            User driven
        

        
            Code:  4 
        

        Role of users or customers

        

        
            Observation of a market niche
        

        
            Code:  5a 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Solution for a problem
        

        
            Code:  5b 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        

        
            Performance
        

        
            Code:  7 
        

        [ This code has no detailed description ]

        


No matching items

sector

text:
spinoff
Linking innovatons to names of entities of which the innovation spunoff










Available Fields


    

        Innovation ID
        
         innovation_id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        

        Spinoff
        
         spinoff 

        The university or research institute that that the innovation spun off from

        

        Literal Name
        
         name

title: Relationship type
text:
type
The type of relationship between the innovaiton and entity










 Coded values 


    

        
            Innovating Firm
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        The firm that brought the innovation to market

        

        
            Contact Person
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        A person that has been cited to talk about the innovation in the source articles.

        

        
            Inventor
        

        
            Code:  4 
        

        One of the inventors of the innovation.

        

        
            Previously developing firm
        

        
            Code:  6 
        

        A firm that has developed the firm prior to the innovating firm.

        

        
            Collaborator
        

        
            Code:  9 
        

        A firm that collaborated in the development of the innovation.

        

        
            Funder
        

        
            Code:  11 
        

        An organisation that has funded part of the innovations development.

        


No matching items

title: Entity
text:
entity
Companies, organisatons and people










Available Fields


    

        Country
        
         country 

        In which country was the collaborating actor located during the collaboration. ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 codes with amendments.

        

        Science_spin-off
        
         science_spin 

        Is the company a spinoff from a university or research institute

        

        Entity ID
        
         entity_id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the entity.

        

        SINNO's_common_name
        
         name 

        The common name of the firm or organization

        

        Person
        
         person 

        Boolean, true|1 if the entity is a person. -- not part of the public dataset.

        



No matching items

title: codebook contents
text:
This page gives a full accounting of all the tables and fields in the database. For reference of how the fields relate to tables, visit the individual table-pages.

Available Fields


    

        Article
        
         article 

        LBIO sources

        

        Entity
        
         entity 

        Companies, organisatons and people

        

        Exploiter
        
         exploiter 

        Linking innovatons to names of entities exploiting the innovation

        

        Innovation to Article
        
         innovation_article 

        Connecting table between innovations and articles

        

        Innovation to Entity
        
         innovation_entity 

        Companies, people and organisations

        

        Origin
        
         origin 

        Innovation origin

        

        Spinoff
        
         spinoff 

        Linking innovatons to names of entities of which the innovation spunoff

        

        Technological Knowhow
        
         techknow 

        Technological Knowhow (ADD DEF)

        

        Use Sector
        
         sector 

        Innovation to SNI-use sector table.

        

        innovation
        
         innovation 

        The heart of the SWINNO database

        



No matching items



Available Fields


    

        Additional_info_if_Origin__2a_Official_regulation,_legislation_and_standards.
        
         ori_2a_note 

        Additional information if Origin Official regulation legislation and standards

        

        Additional_information_if_Origin__1a_New_scientific_discovery
        
         ori_1a_note 

        Additional information if Origin New scientific discovery

        

        Additional_information_if_Origin__1b_New_technologies_or_materials
        
         ori_1b_note 

        Additional information if Origin New technologies or materials

        

        Additional_information_if_Origin__20_Other
        
         ori_20_note 

        Additional information if Origin Other

        

        Additional_information_if_Origin__5b_Solution_for_a_problem
        
         ori_5b_note 

        Additional information if Origin Solution for a problem

        

        Additional_information_if_Origin__7_Performance
        
         ori_7_note 

        Additional information if Origin Performance

        

        Annex_or_supplement
        
         annex 

        The article s annex or supplement if any

        

        Article ID
        
         article_id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the source article.

        

        Article ID
        
         id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the source article.

        

        Article title
        
         title 

        The title of the source article.

        

        Article type
        
         type 

        A characterisation of the source content

        

        Artifactual_complexity
        
         art_comp 

        What is the complexity of the innovation as artifact as opposed to the development of the innovation

        

        Commissioner
        
         commissioner 

        Name of the agent company governmental agency etc that has commissioned the innovation

        

        Corporate_group
        
         corp 

        In the SWINNO extension collection Name of the corporate group of the firm as stated in the source article

        

        Country
        
         country 

        In which country was the collaborating actor located during the collaboration. ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 codes with amendments.

        

        Description_in_Swedish
        
         desc_sv 

        Description of the innovation in Swedish This may include the purpose or function of the innovation and what is new about it and how it works

        

        Developed_in_collaboration_with_other_actors
        
         collaboration 

        Has the development of the innovation included collaboration with others

        

        Developmental_complexity
        
         dev_comp 

        Complexity of the development of the innovation

        

        Entity ID
        
         entity_id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the entity.

        

        External_financing_received
        
         ext_financed 

        Has external funding been received

        

        Firm_founded_for_development_or_commercialization
        
         firm_launched_development 

        Was the firm founded to develop or commercialize the innovation

        

        Firm_only_produces_the_innovation
        
         prod_only 

        If the firm recorded as Innovating firm produces the innovation but has not developed it this variable has the value 1

        

        Id
        
         id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the link between innovation and article.

        

        Innovation ID
        
         innovation_id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        

        Innovation Status
        
         status 

        Status of the innovation

        

        Innovation to Article ID
        
         id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        

        Innovation to Entity ID
        
         id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        

        Innovation_name_in_English
        
         name_en 

        Name of the innovation in English if any and if different from the Swedish name

        

        Innovation_name_in_Swedish
        
         name_sv 

        Name of the innovation if any

        

        Issue
        
         issue 

        The journal s or annex issue that contains the article

        

        Journal_or_magazine
        
         journal_magazine 

        The journal or magazine that contains the article This could be a standardized rather than a literal name

        

        Literal Name
        
         name 

        Literal name of an entity, as written in the article.

        

        Location
        
         loc 

        Location of the innovating firm

        

        Notes
        
         notes 

        Additional notes about the article.

        

        Novelty_from_firm_perspective
        
         novelty_firm 

        Degree of novelty from the firm perspective

        

        Novelty_from_market_perspective
        
         novelty_mkt 

        Degree of novelty from the perspective of the Swedish and the global market respectively

        

        Origins
        
         origin 

        Which factors contributed to the origin of the innovation

        

        Pages
        
         pages 

        On which pages does the article occur

        

        Patented
        
         patented 

        The number of identified patents of the innovation.

        

        Person
        
         person 

        Boolean, true|1 if the entity is a person. -- not part of the public dataset.

        

        Previously_developing_firms
        
         prev_dev 

        Name of firm previously responsible for the development of the innovation

        

        Product_code
        
         prod_code 

        Product code of the innovation according to Svensk Näringslivsindelning SNI 2002 In principle a five digit code is entered where possible

        

        Public_technology_program's_name
        
         pub_tech_prog 

        If there is a public technology program involved then what is the name

        

        Public_technology_program_involved
        
         used_pub_prog 

        Has a public technology program been involved in the development of the innovation

        

        Relationship subtype
        
         subtype 

        The subtype of relationship between the innovaiton and collaborating or funding organizations

        

        Relationship type
        
         type 

        The type of relationship between the innovaiton and entity

        

        SINNO's_common_name
        
         name 

        The common name of the firm or organization

        

        Science_spin-off
        
         science_spin 

        Is the company a spinoff from a university or research institute

        

        Spinoff
        
         spinoff 

        The university or research institute that that the innovation spun off from

        

        Start_year_of_development
        
         year_dev 

        In which year did the development of the innovation start

        

        Technical Knowhow
        
         techknow 

        Technican knowhow

        

        Use_sectors
        
         use_sector 

        User sector of the innovation according to  Svensk Näringslivsindelning SNI 2002, with a few custom codes.

        

        Volume
        
         vol 

        The volume of the source article

        

        Year of issue
        
         year 

        The year in which the article was published.

        

        Year_of_commercialization
        
         year 

        Commercialization year of the innovation This is either the year as mentioned in the sources or if no year is mentioned the year of the earliest article that reports that the innovation is for sale

        

        Year_of_first_presentation
        
         yr_first_present 

        The year that the basic idea of the innovation was presented

        

        Year_of_first_prototype
        
         year_proto 

        The year in which the first prototype was introduced

        

        a_patent_application_exists
        
         pat_applied 

        A patent application exists for the innovation.

        

        export_has_started
        
         exported 

        Export of the innovation has started.

        

        firm_applying_for_patent
        
         pat_firm_applying 

        The name of the firm that is applying for a patent related to the innovation.

        

        patent_granted
        
         pat_granted 

        At least one patent had been granted.

        

        start_year_of_export
        
         yr_export 

        The year in which the innovation was first exported

        



No matching items

        Name of the agent company governmental agency etc that has commissioned the innovation

        

        External_financing_received
        
         ext_financed 

        Has external funding been received

        

        Corporate_group
        
         corp 

        In the SWINNO extension collection Name of the corporate group of the firm as stated in the source article

        

        Location
        
         loc 

        Location of the innovating firm

        



No matching items

title: Innovation to Article
text:
innovation_article
Connecting table between innovations and articles










Available Fields


    

        Article ID
        
         article_id 

        Unique, stable identifier for the source article.

        

        Innovation ID
        
         innovation_id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        



No matching items

title: Artifactual_complexity
text:
art_comp
What is the complexity of the innovation as artifact as opposed to the development of the innovation










 Coded values 


    

        
            High
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        The innovations is a system consisting of multiple functional parts. Examples are communications networks, ships and factories

        

        
            Medium
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        The innovation is a single unit. Examples are pharmaceuticals, software, tools

        

        
            Low
        

        
            Code:  3 
        

        The innovation is a single coherent unit. Examples are a cover for a device such as a phone or a special metal alloy or other material.

        


No matching items

title: Developmental_complexity
text:
dev_comp
Complexity of the development of the innovation










 Coded values 


    

        
            High
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        More than two disciplines are involved in the development of the innovation.

        

        
            Medium
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        Two disciplines are involved in the development of the innovation.

        

        
            Low
        

        
            Code:  3 
        

        One discipline is involved in the development of the innovation.

        


No matching items

title: Product_code
text:
prod_code
Product code of the innovation according to Svensk Näringslivsindelning SNI 2002 In principle a five digit code is entered where possible










 Coded values 


    

        
            Code could not be established
        

        
            Code:  Unknown 
        

        Code could not be established.

        

        
            general use for end-users (final consumers)
        

        
            Code:  -101 
        

        This is not an official SNI code

        

        
            general use for companies
        

        
            Code:  -100 
        

        This is not an official SNI code

        


No matching items

title: Origin
text:
origin
Innovation origin










Available Fields


    

        Innovation ID
        
         innovation_id 

        The SINNO ID uniquely identifies an item in the database so even between collections there are no doubles The ID consists of a follow number plus a three digit extension that indicates what kind of thing it is

        

        Origins
        
         origin 

        Which factors contributed to the origin of the innovation

        



No matching items

title: Article type
text:
type
A characterisation of the source content










 Coded values 


    

        
            Article - Innovation focus
        

        
            Code:  1 
        

        Articles of this type focus on an innovation or one or more aspects thereof, e.g. financing, commercialization, development, etc.

        

        
            Article - Overview
        

        
            Code:  2 
        

        Overview articles about an industrial sector or production process or other category. These articles may mention or cover innovations. This category includes for example rankings and competitions, but Fair-reports are not included. Fair reports have their own code.

        

        
            Article - Fair
        

        
            Code:  3 
        

        An article about a fair ('mässa' in Swedish).

        

        
            Article - Product news
        

        
            Code:  4 
        

        Article of one or a few paragraphs. It focusses exclusively on a new product. Usually, the section heading or additional titles (for example at the top of the column or page) indicate that it is product news or news.

        

        
            Article - Other
        

        
            Code:  5 
        

        This category covers types of articles that are not covered by other codes. Or it can be used for uncommon situations. For example, when an article contains information that is used for multiple innovations but depending on the innovation one would choose a different article-type

        

        
            No article type selected
        

        
            Code:  8 
        

        The source is an article, but the atype of article has not been selected. This code should normally not occur.

        

        
            Source not available
        

        
            Code:  9 
        

        This article could not be categorized because it has no sources linked to it / there is no access to the article. This code was used for data-editing purposes. It should normally not occur.

        


No matching items

title: SWINNO Living Codebook
text:
Welcome to the living codebook accompanying the public export of the SWINNO database.
This site is an open and searchable documentation covering the structure, fields and different coded values of the public SWINNO database.
The documentation is divided into three parts according to the three types of objects that are recorded into the database:

Innovation
Entity, people, companies and organisations.
Articles, bibliographic references to the source material

In the Innovation section you will find all the recorded information pertaining directly to the innovation. For the types of data that can have several values linked to the same innovation, such as Use Sector, are placed in a separate table.
Under the Entity and Articles sections you will also find a separate table that link innovations to the respective entities or articles.
If you find any mistakes or errors in the codebook, pleaser report them using the Report an issue, alternatively edit the file directly on github through the Edit this page in the footer of each page.
